name: Tankegeddon
description:
40 levels, 12 enemy types, 1 tank to defeat them all. It's Tankegeddon!

Tankegeddon is a top down tank shooter consisting of 40 levels and 12 different enemy tanks. Survive the onslaught of tanks in each level with a set number of lives. If you lose all your lives you'll have to start over again.

Tankegeddon includes 4 different difficulty modes, easy, normal, hard and impossible which determine the number of lives you start out with.
